price: And We have made therein for you means of sustenance and for those[8] whom you do not provide.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَا لَكُمۡ فِيهَا مَعَٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسۡتُمۡ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
footnotes: [8] i.e., the children, servants, and livestock that one is blessed with.
